argumentText:
ARGUMENT
j

| Step | Hyp | Ref | Expression |
|---|---|---|---|

| 1 |  | #P_df-2ndc | |- 2ndc = { j | E. x e. TopBases ( x ~<_ _om /\ ( topGen ` x ) = j ) } |
| 2 | 1 | #P_eleq2i | |- ( J e. 2ndc <-> J e. { j | E. x e. TopBases ( x ~<_ _om /\ ( topGen ` x ) = j ) } ) |
| 3 |  | #P_simpr | |- ( ( x ~<_ _om /\ ( topGen ` x ) = J ) -> ( topGen ` x ) = J ) |
| 4 |  | #P_fvex | |- ( topGen ` x ) e. _V |
| 5 | 3, 4 | #P_syl6eqelr | |- ( ( x ~<_ _om /\ ( topGen ` x ) = J ) -> J e. _V ) |
| 6 | 5 | #P_rexlimivw | |- ( E. x e. TopBases ( x ~<_ _om /\ ( topGen ` x ) = J ) -> J e. _V ) |
| 7 |  | #P_eqeq2 | |- ( j = J -> ( ( topGen ` x ) = j <-> ( topGen ` x ) = J ) ) |
| 8 | 7 | #P_anbi2d | |- ( j = J -> ( ( x ~<_ _om /\ ( topGen ` x ) = j ) <-> ( x ~<_ _om /\ ( topGen ` x ) = J ) ) ) |
| 9 | 8 | #P_rexbidv | |- ( j = J -> ( E. x e. TopBases ( x ~<_ _om /\ ( topGen ` x ) = j ) <-> E. x e. TopBases ( x ~<_ _om /\ ( topGen ` x ) = J ) ) ) |
| 10 | 6, 9 | #P_elab3 | |- ( J e. { j | E. x e. TopBases ( x ~<_ _om /\ ( topGen ` x ) = j ) } <-> E. x e. TopBases ( x ~<_ _om /\ ( topGen ` x ) = J ) ) |
| 11 | 2, 10 | #P_bitri | |- ( J e. 2ndc <-> E. x e. TopBases ( x ~<_ _om /\ ( topGen ` x ) = J ) ) |
